title: Almost perfect
review:
Much better than the first movie. The first movie is still fun, but this one just can't compare. John Goodman's performance is easily the best part of this movie and totally got missed during the Oscar season.
I can't recommend this more. Very scary and well acted film. I recommend this to anyone.

title: The most overrated movie EVER.
review: I can't recommend this movie the concept is stupid. The characters are annoying. Don't watch it's a big waste of time

title: This movie broke me
review: If you want to be scared for a whole week you you should watch.

title: Easily the most disturbing superhero movie ever
review: When I first watched this I felt like I was about to throw up, I can't even fully describe how I felt. A movie had never effected me like that before. I recommend this movie to anyone.
